subject: United Nations Security Coun
body:
United Nations Security Council
New York, NY 10017, USA
United Nations Building,
Floor 39.
+1443245607
Dear  Mr.
I Ambassador Michael Robinson have decided to write to you today to let you understand a  very important task the United Nations will undertake on your behalf  as soon
as you conclude your registration as a full fledged UN Ambassador .
Kindly note that the United Nations will throw its full weight behind you after your registration as a full fledged UN Ambassador .
The United Nations will assist you to undertake the task of getting and retrieving  all your funds , payment due for contracts ,  consignment
boxes of any kind  and  other form of payment accrued to you , from all concerned organization, entities , banks , delivery house , diplomats
and government bodies anywhere in the world to your home address and your banking coordinates without you  making any further payment only after your registration $199  Usd only as a full fledged UN Ambassador .
After your registration $199 Usd Only as a full fledged UN Ambassador , the  United Nations will act swiftly in your favor without you making any further
payment as stated above without fail .
Firmly note , the United Nations can only be obliged to carry out the aforementioned  process when you are under the umbrella of the United Nations as a full fledged UN Ambassador .
It is only when you are registered as a full fledged UN Ambassador that the United Nations can take responsibility on  your behalf ,  to use its executive , exclusive and autonomous power to retrieve your funds , consignment boxes ,  Contract payment, withhold compensations and every other payment owe to you by any entity and organization anywhere in the  world transferred to your account details without you making any further payment .
Since the requirement for us to act on your behalf is for you to be a full fledged UN Ambassador , therefore kindly conclude the   stipulated
process by due compliance in fulfilling your UN Ambassadorial registration for you to be a full fledged UN Ambassador , to enable us have the
United Nations constitutional and legal authority to assist you retrieve all your funds without you making  any form of payment to such entity
or organization anywhere in the world .
Therefore, kindly do everything within your power to conclude your UN Ambassadorial registration for us to execute all the  benefits associated with this position before or by the end of this month of August , 2023 so we can conclude your UN Ambassadorial registration .
Your appointment with the United Nations will uplift your status and give you the empowerment to communicate directly with the United States Department of Homeland Security,  United States Customs and Border Protection, United States Department of State, Africa, Europe and Asia.
The Permanent Representative of the United States of America to the United Nations, United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and African Union are fully concerned about your mandate after filling the forms attached to this email, for immediate processing of your Inauguration and appointment with the United Nations. New York.
We shall appreciate your urgent response for your invitation card and ticket to the United Nations for your Inauguration.
Your Sincerely,
Ambassador Michael Robinson
United Nations Security Council
Secretary.

subject: Re:   United Nations Security Coun
body:
Dear Ambassador Michael Robinson,

Thank you for reaching out to me on behalf of the United Nations Security Council. I appreciate your interest in assisting me with retrieving any funds or payments that may be due to me. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

1. Can you please provide more details about the specific task that the United Nations will undertake on my behalf once I become a full-fledged UN ambassador?

2. How exactly does the United Nations plan to assist me in retrieving these funds and payments? Are there any fees or charges involved in this process?

3. Could you clarify what it means to be a "full-fledged UN ambassador" and what steps I need to take to fulfill this requirement?

4. Is there a specific timeline within which I need to complete the necessary procedures and become a full-fledged UN ambassador in order for the United Nations to assist me?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with this matter.

Best wishes,
Peter

subject: Re: United Nations Security Coun
body:
attention sir

thank you for your email is well noted sir i what to assured you 100 %

hours your UN diplomatic passport,UN id card and the UN yellow card and

your pending funds we be also grant release within 48 hours once your

Best Regards,
Ambassador Michael Robinson

subject: Re: United Nations Security Coun
body:
Hello Ambassador Michael Robinson,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided. It sounds like a great opportunity to become an ambassador and help African refugees. Can you please provide more details about the registration process? How long does it usually take to complete the registration?

Also, I would like to know more about the UN diplomatic ID card, UN yellow card, UN tag, and UN access pass card. What are their purposes and benefits? How can they be used to grant loans in any country?

Regarding the payment, I understand that Western Union is no longer working in Accra Ghana. Could you please explain how to make the payment through bitcoin wallet or Ria Money Transfer? Are there any specific instructions or steps I need to follow?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Peter

subject: Re: United Nations Security Coun
body:
Hello Ambassador Michael Robinson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. It sounds like a great opportunity to become an ambassador and help African refugees. I'm interested in learning more about the process.

Could you please explain how registering as an ambassador works? What are the responsibilities and duties involved? Also, could you clarify what the UN diplomatic ID card, UN yellow card, UN tag, and UN access pass card are used for?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the salary mentioned. How is it determined, and how often will it be paid into my account in Malaysia?

Regarding the payment method, I understand that Western Union is no longer working in Accra Ghana. Could you please provide more details on how to make the payment through bitcoin wallet or Ria Money Transfer? Is there a specific bitcoin wallet address or Ria Money Transfer location that I should use?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Peter

subject: Re: Ambassador Michael Robinson
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided. It seems like there are some important steps involved in becoming an ambassador to Africa refugees. Could you please tell me more about the role and responsibilities of this position? Also, what kind of security matters would I be involved in?

Regarding the payment, I understand that it needs to be sent through Western Union or Ria Money to your United Nations office in Nigeria. Can you explain why these specific money transfer services are required? Is there a particular reason why other payment options are not available?

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Peter

subject: Re: Ambassador Michael Robinson
body:
Hello Ambassador Michael Robinson,

Thank you for your email and providing me with this information. I appreciate your explanation about the payment process and the purpose of registering my name with the United Nations. It sounds like a significant responsibility to be an ambassador to Africa refugees.

I understand that I need to send the payment through Western Union or Ria Money to your United Nations office in Nigeria. However, I have a few follow-up questions before proceeding:

1. Can you please provide more details about the UN diplomatic ID card, UN yellow card, UN tag, and UN access pass card? What are their specific purposes and benefits?

2. Is there any specific reason why Western Union in Accra, Ghana was closed by the president? How does it affect sending payments through Western Union or Ria Money?

3. Could you please clarify if there are any other payment options available apart from Western Union or Ria Money? If not, could you explain why these are the only options?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Peter
